thread.title: Clinton to push new gun controls after Oregon shooting

title: Clinton to push new gun controls after Oregon shooting
text: Clinton to push new gun controls after Oregon shooting Monday, 5 October 2015 (9 minutes ago) Just days after a deadly shooting in Oregon, Hillary Rodham Clinton will unveil new gun control measures on Monday aimed at strengthening background checks on gun buyers and eliminating legal immunity for sellers. White House Call for 'Sensible' Gun Control Measures in Wake of Oregon Shooting 00:38 White House Press Secretary Josh Earnest said Thursday that "sensible steps" to protect communities from gun violence are a "top priority" for President Obama, after a shooting at a community college in southwestern Oregon. Earnest told reporters "We've not yet seen that kind of strong bipartisan...
